item.title: By: J.Smedelysux
item.dc:creator: J.Smedelysux
item.description:
No im still new to eq2 but I can say reading about the Jedi thing and how John only gave a crap about bottom line and the Lucas arts badge to bring him the money.
I just wana puke on him...and SOny Japanese CEO is ok with his behavior? Cause last time I checked with my JP friend he would have been ass ripped for that business tactic even fired if it brings shame to the company.
item.content:encoded:
No im still new to eq2 but I can say reading about the Jedi thing and how John only gave a crap about bottom line and the Lucas arts badge to bring him the money.

I just wana puke on him…and SOny Japanese CEO is ok with his behavior? Cause last time I checked with my JP friend he would have been ass ripped for that business tactic even fired if it brings shame to the company.
